basic_info.description: üëã My name is Tianyou, I am a proactive and self-motivated developer with commercial experience in full-stack development. I have proven ability and rich experience from multiple projects and work knowledge with coding. With my excellent time management skill, advanced planning ability, and solid learning capability, I look forward to embracing my next career challenge. Thank you üíú

projects.title: Vicamp
projects.description: ‚óè Designed and developed an online platform to help clients with personalized trip routes and convenient trip consideration as a full-stack developer ‚óè Implemented frontend with JavaScript ES6, ejs, Bootstrap 5, Responsive design, Mapbox GL JS ‚óè Implemented backend with node.js, express.js, npm/yarn, express-session, helmet, morgan, env-cmd, joi, mongoose, multer, passport, cloudinary ‚óè Implemented MongoDB database ‚óè Deployed backend on AWS EC2 and using AWS Route 53 to host the domain ‚óè Utilized Postman, Github, VS code to aid development for Vicamp project

projects.title: Smart Brain
projects.description: ‚óè Developed the front-end project with React.js, React-tilt, npm, Webpack, Babel, ESLint ‚óè Developed the back-end RESTful API with Node.js, Express.js, knex, cors, bcryptnodejs, PostgreSQL ‚óè Deployed on Heroku for front-end, back-end and database

projects.title: Chat Room
projects.description: ‚óè Implemented RESTful API with Node.js, Express.js ‚óè Using ReactJS and CSS Modules to build a single-page web application ‚óè Using useState, useEffect, useContext, useRef Hooks in React.js to develop the web app ‚óè Successfully deployed to Heroku

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: ‚óè Using React.js and Styled Component to build a single-page web application ‚óè Get latitude and longitude by using Mapbox Geocoding API ‚óè Applying Weatherstack API to grab weather data ‚óè Successfully deployed to Heroku
